Text:
Oops! TitlePic is missing :(.
So just 15 instead of 16 files as posted.

Cheers anyway :D
This is not the complete season of Camelot.. after Episode 10 ends it says stay tuned for the season finally of Camelot coming on Next.. Just saying.. Trying to help
Maybe I'm Missing something here or just a mistake by stazs and the end of episode 10.. Anyone care to elaborate on this please??

as far as I can see, but I am not the specialist, this is where you find your information:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Camelot_episodes
Hope this helps?
Probably means they repeated the telecast of episode 10..They often do that..

The Starz schedule shows for Friday June 10, 2011, Camelot E110 at 10pm with a direct repeat at 11pm.
http://www.starz.com/guides/1106STZ1.pdf

The Rip is from the first airing. That's why the season finale is announced again during the credits.
No worries, this is the complete season 1, if you follow the link to Wikipedia you can see that there are indeed only 10 episodes ;).

@hakuna_matata:
I don't mind people spamming my torrents with links to allegedly better versions, because my torrents speak for themselves, but I'd appreciate if you could state why the linked version is supposed to be better!?
Because the version you are linking to is a NapisyPL release - I admire their work, but they achieve the smaller file size by shrinking the files to a much lower resolution.
So it is hardly better, if you want to watch on a bigger screen.

As I said, I don't mind you linking to other torrents, but your spam comment should have looked like this:

If you are looking for a smaller file size and lower resolution look here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6464354/Camelot_Season1_%28XviD_asd%29_EnglishV_NapisyPL

Cheers
The first and last season only has10 episodes, so this is the complete series. Do your research leaches... also cheers manOtor for the upload

some1 who knows?

manOtor, thank you for this upload. Also, I found your comment to hakuna_matata very kind & respectful. it is nice to see someone take the time to point out something without being hateful. I admire that and you are a credit to PB.
